attributes.action: ban Hizb ut-Tahrir and other radical groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should groups that want to turn Britain into an Islamic state with repressive Sharia law and where women, homosexuals and others are second class citizens be allowed to operate freely in our country? Hizb-ut-Tahrir says “Jews should be killed wherever they are found” and that it is totally opposed democracy. It’s time to ban these groups that are poising our country. Egypt, Germany and China are some of the 40 countries that have banned Hizb-ut-Tahrir – it’s time for us to do the same.
